Bash(cd /Users/jasonrudder/pmtvs-core/packages/pmtvs-vector && env VIRTUAL_ENV=/Users/jasonrudder/pmtvs-core/.venv PATH="/Users/jasonrudder/.cargo/bin:/Users/jasonrudder/pmtvs-core/.venv/bin:/usr/bin:/bin:/usr/sbin:/sbin" /Users/jasonrudder/pmtvs-core/.venv/bin/python3 -c "
import numpy as np
from scipy.signal import hilbert
import pmtvs_vector

np.random.seed\(42\)
y_random = np.random.randn\(500\)
t = np.linspace\(0, 4*np.pi, 500\)
y_sine = np.sin\(t\) + 0.1 * np.random.randn\(500\)

for name, y in [\('random', y_random\), \('sine', y_sine\)]:
    # Python hilbert
    analytic = hilbert\(y\)
    inst_amp_py = np.abs\(analytic\)
    phase_py = np.unwrap\(np.angle\(analytic\)\)
    inst_freq_py = np.diff\(phase_py\) / \(2 * np.pi\)
    
    # Rust
    rs = pmtvs_vector.compute_signal_vector\(y, ['hilbert_stability']\)
    
    print\(f'--- {name} ---'\)
    print\(f'Python freq_mean: {np.mean\(inst_freq_py\):.10f}'\)
    print\(f'Rust   freq_mean: {rs[\\"hilbert_freq_mean\\"]:.10f}'\)
    print\(f'Python freq_std:  {np.std\(inst_freq_py\):.10f}'\)
    print\(f'Rust   freq_std:  {rs[\\"hilbert_freq_std\\"]:.10f}'\)
    print\(f'Python amp_cv:    {np.std\(inst_amp_py\) / np.mean\(inst_amp_py\):.10f}'\)
    print\(f'Rust   amp_cv:    {rs[\\"hilbert_amp_cv\\"]:.10f}'\)
    print\(f'Python phase_coh: {np.mean\(np.cos\(np.diff\(phase_py\)\)\):.10f}'\)
    print\(f'Rust   phase_coh: {rs[\\"hilbert_phase_coherence\\"]:.10f}'\)
    print\(\)
" 2>&1)

Bash(cd /Users/jasonrudder/pmtvs-core/packages/pmtvs-vector && env VIRTUAL_ENV=/Users/jasonrudder/pmtvs-core/.venv PATH="/Users/jasonrudder/.cargo/bin:/Users/jasonrudder/pmtvs-core/.venv/bin:/usr/bin:/bin:/usr/sbin:/sbin" /Users/jasonrudder/pmtvs-core/.venv/bin/python3 -c "
import numpy as np
from scipy.signal import hilbert as scipy_hilbert

np.random.seed\(42\)
y = np.random.randn\(500\).astype\(np.float64\)
n = len\(y\)

# Naive DFT-based Hilbert \(matching our Rust code exactly\)
pi2 = 2 * np.pi

# Forward DFT
fft_re = np.zeros\(n\)
fft_im = np.zeros\(n\)
for k in range\(n\):
    for j in range\(n\):
        angle = pi2 * k * j / n
        fft_re[k] += y[j] * np.cos\(angle\)
        fft_im[k] -= y[j] * np.sin\(angle\)

# Hilbert multiplier
h = np.zeros\(n\)
h[0] = 1.0
if n % 2 == 0:
    h[n//2] = 1.0
    h[1:n//2] = 2.0
else:
    h[1:\(n+1\)//2] = 2.0

fft_re *= h
fft_im *= h

# Inverse DFT
out_re = np.zeros\(n\)
out_im = np.zeros\(n\)
for j in range\(n\):
    for k in range\(n\):
        angle = pi2 * j * k / n
        out_re[j] += fft_re[k] * np.cos\(angle\) - fft_im[k] * np.sin\(angle\)
        out_im[j] += fft_re[k] * np.sin\(angle\) + fft_im[k] * np.cos\(angle\)
out_re /= n
out_im /= n

# scipy
analytic = scipy_hilbert\(y\)
scipy_re = np.real\(analytic\)
scipy_im = np.imag\(analytic\)

# Compare
print\(f'Max |naive_re - scipy_re|: {np.max\(np.abs\(out_re - scipy_re\)\):.2e}'\)
print\(f'Max |naive_im - scipy_im|: {np.max\(np.abs\(out_im - scipy_im\)\):.2e}'\)
print\(f'Max |naive_re - y|:        {np.max\(np.abs\(out_re - y\)\):.2e}'\)

# Check freq stats
phase_naive = np.unwrap\(np.arctan2\(out_im, out_re\)\)
freq_naive = np.diff\(phase_naive\) / \(2*np.pi\)
phase_scipy = np.unwrap\(np.angle\(analytic\)\)
freq_scipy = np.diff\(phase_scipy\) / \(2*np.pi\)

print\(f'Mean freq \(naive DFT\): {np.mean\(freq_naive\):.10f}'\)
print\(f'Mean freq \(scipy\):     {np.mean\(freq_scipy\):.10f}'\)
print\(f'Max |freq_naive - freq_scipy|: {np.max\(np.abs\(freq_naive - freq_scipy\)\):.2e}'\)
" 2>&1)

Bash(cd /Users/jasonrudder/pmtvs-core/packages/pmtvs-vector && env VIRTUAL_ENV=/Users/jasonrudder/pmtvs-core/.venv PATH="/Users/jasonrudder/.cargo/bin:/Users/jasonrudder/pmtvs-core/.venv/bin:/usr/bin:/bin:/usr/sbin:/sbin" /Users/jasonrudder/pmtvs-core/.venv/bin/python3 -c "
import numpy as np
np.random.seed\(42\)
signals = {
    'random': np.random.randn\(500\),
    'sine': np.sin\(np.linspace\(0, 10 * np.pi, 500\)\),
    'trend': np.linspace\(0, 10, 500\) + np.random.randn\(500\) * 0.1,
}

# Check DMD eigenvalues with the Python implementation
from pmtvs import dmd_decompose
for name, y in signals.items\(\):
    result = dmd_decompose\(y\)
    print\(f'--- {name} ---'\)
    for k, v in sorted\(result.items\(\)\):
        print\(f'  {k}: {v}'\)

# Also check lyapunov details
from pmtvs import lyapunov_rosenstein
for name, y in signals.items\(\):
    result = lyapunov_rosenstein\(y\)
    exp = result[0] if isinstance\(result, tuple\) else result
    print\(f'lyap {name}: exponent={exp}'\)
" 2>&1)

import numpy as np
import pmtvs_vector

# Test signals
y_sine = np.sin\(np.linspace\(0, 10 * np.pi, 500\)\)
y_random = np.random.RandomState\(42\).randn\(500\)
y_trend = np.linspace\(0, 10, 500\) + np.random.RandomState\(42\).randn\(500\) * 0.1

for name, y in [\('sine', y_sine\), \('random', y_random\), \('trend', y_trend\)]:
    result = pmtvs_vector.compute_signal_vector\(y, ['dmd']\)
    print\(f'{name}: freq={result[\\"dmd_dominant_freq\\"]:.6f}, growth={result[\\"dmd_growth_rate\\"]:.6f}, stable={result[\\"dmd_is_stable\\"]}, modes={result[\\"dmd_n_modes\\"]}'\)

Bash(cd /Users/jasonrudder/pmtvs-core/packages/pmtvs-vector && env VIRTUAL_ENV=/Users/jasonrudder/pmtvs-core/.venv PATH="/Users/jasonrudder/.cargo/bin:/Users/jasonrudder/pmtvs-core/.venv/bin:/usr/bin:/bin:/usr/sbin:/sbin" /Users/jasonrudder/pmtvs-core/.venv/bin/python -c "
import numpy as np

y = np.sin\(np.linspace\(0, 10 * np.pi, 500\)\)
delay = 10
n_rows = len\(y\) - delay + 1
m = n_rows - 1  # 490

# Build Hankel
X = np.zeros\(\(delay, m\)\)
Xp = np.zeros\(\(delay, m\)\)
for j in range\(m\):
    for i in range\(delay\):
        X[i, j] = y[j + i]
        Xp[i, j] = y[j + 1 + i]

# Gram matrix
G = X @ X.T
print\(f'G shape: {G.shape}'\)

# SVD of G \(eigendecomp since symmetric\)
eigvals, eigvecs = np.linalg.eigh\(G\)
eigvals = eigvals[::-1]  # descending
eigvecs = eigvecs[:, ::-1]
print\(f'G eigenvalues: {eigvals}'\)

sing_vals = np.sqrt\(np.maximum\(eigvals, 0\)\)
print\(f'Singular values: {sing_vals}'\)

s_max = sing_vals[0]
sv_threshold = 1e-10 * s_max
print\(f's_max={s_max}, threshold={sv_threshold}'\)
r = np.sum\(sing_vals > sv_threshold\)
print\(f'Effective rank: {r}'\)

# For comparison, numpy SVD
U_np, S_np, Vt_np = np.linalg.svd\(X, full_matrices=False\)
print\(f'NumPy SVD S: {S_np}'\)
print\(f'NumPy SVD rank>threshold: {np.sum\(S_np > sv_threshold\)}'\)
" 2>&1)

Bash(cd /Users/jasonrudder/pmtvs-core/packages/pmtvs-vector && env VIRTUAL_ENV=/Users/jasonrudder/pmtvs-core/.venv PATH="/Users/jasonrudder/.cargo/bin:/Users/jasonrudder/pmtvs-core/.venv/bin:/usr/bin:/bin:/usr/sbin:/sbin" /Users/jasonrudder/pmtvs-core/.venv/bin/python -c "
import numpy as np

# Check all signal types
for name, y in [
    \('sine', np.sin\(np.linspace\(0, 10 * np.pi, 500\)\)\),
    \('random', np.random.RandomState\(42\).randn\(500\)\),
    \('trend', np.linspace\(0, 10, 500\) + np.random.RandomState\(42\).randn\(500\) * 0.1\),
]:
    delay = 10
    n_rows = len\(y\) - delay + 1
    m = n_rows - 1
    X = np.zeros\(\(delay, m\)\)
    for j in range\(m\):
        for i in range\(delay\):
            X[i, j] = y[j + i]
    G = X @ X.T
    eigvals = np.linalg.eigvalsh\(G\)[::-1]
    svs = np.sqrt\(np.maximum\(eigvals, 0\)\)
    s_max = svs[0]
    print\(f'{name}: s_max={s_max:.4f}, svs={np.array2string\(svs, precision=2, suppress_small=True\)}'\)
    print\(f'  ratio svs/s_max: {np.array2string\(svs/s_max, precision=8\)}'\)
    for thresh in [1e-6, 1e-7, 1e-8]:
        r = np.sum\(svs > thresh * s_max\)
        print\(f'  threshold={thresh}: r={r}'\)
    # NumPy SVD for comparison
    _, S_np, _ = np.linalg.svd\(X, full_matrices=False\)
    print\(f'  numpy SVD: {np.array2string\(S_np, precision=2, suppress_small=True\)}'\)
    r_np = np.sum\(S_np > 1e-10 * S_np[0]\)
    print\(f'  numpy effective rank \(1e-10\): {r_np}'\)
    print\(\)
" 2>&1)

import numpy as np
import sys
sys.path.insert\(0, '/Users/jasonrudder/pmtvs-core/packages/pmtvs-dynamics/python'\)
from pmtvs_dynamics.lyapunov import _auto_delay_acf, _auto_dim_simple, lyapunov_rosenstein

np.random.seed\(42\)
y = np.random.randn\(500\)

delay = _auto_delay_acf\(y\)
dim = _auto_dim_simple\(y, delay\)
min_tsep = delay * dim
max_iter = min\(len\(y\) // 10, 500\)
n_points = len\(y\) - \(dim - 1\) * delay

print\(f'Python: delay={delay}, dim={dim}, min_tsep={min_tsep}, max_iter={max_iter}, n_points={n_points}'\)

# Run full lyapunov
result = lyapunov_rosenstein\(y\)
print\(f'Python result: exponent={result[0]}'\)

# Check ACF values at early lags
centered = y - np.mean\(y\)
var = np.var\(centered\)
for lag in range\(1, 10\):
    acf = np.mean\(centered[:-lag] * centered[lag:]\) / var
    print\(f'  ACF\(lag={lag}\) = {acf:.6f} \(threshold: {1/np.e:.6f}\)'\)
" 2>&1)

import numpy as np

# Replicate exact test conditions
np.random.seed\(42\)
SIGNALS = {
    'random': np.random.randn\(500\),
    'sine': np.sin\(np.linspace\(0, 10 * np.pi, 500\)\),
    'trend': np.linspace\(0, 10, 500\) + np.random.randn\(500\) * 0.1,
    'constant': np.ones\(500\) * 42.0,
    'step': np.concatenate\([np.zeros\(250\), np.ones\(250\) * 5.0]\),
}

# Now call lyapunov like the test does
from vector.registry import Registry
reg = Registry\(\)
py_fn = reg.get_compute\('lyapunov'\)

# Check what state numpy is in
print\('Random state check:', np.random.random\(\)\)

# Save state
state = np.random.get_state\(\)

y = SIGNALS['random']
result = py_fn\(y\)
print\(f'First call: {result}'\)

# Restore and call again - should be same?
np.random.set_state\(state\)
result2 = py_fn\(y\)
print\(f'Second call: {result2}'\)

# Call without restoring state
result3 = py_fn\(y\)
print\(f'Third call: {result3}'\)
" 2>&1)

Bash(cd /Users/jasonrudder/pmtvs-core/packages/pmtvs-vector && env VIRTUAL_ENV=/Users/jasonrudder/pmtvs-core/.venv PATH="/Users/jasonrudder/.cargo/bin:/Users/jasonrudder/pmtvs-core/.venv/bin:/usr/bin:/bin:/usr/sbin:/sbin" /Users/jasonrudder/pmtvs-core/.venv/bin/python -c "
import numpy as np

np.random.seed\(42\)
y = np.random.randn\(500\)

# Import the installed functions
import sys
sys.path.insert\(0, '/Users/jasonrudder/pmtvs/packages/pmtvs-dynamics/python'\)
from pmtvs_dynamics.lyapunov import _auto_delay_acf, _embed_signal, _find_linear_region
from pmtvs_dynamics._lyapunov_utils import fit_linear_region

delay = _auto_delay_acf\(y\)
print\(f'delay = {delay}'\)

# Test Cao deterministic \(evenly spaced instead of random\)
for dim_try in [3, 5, 8]:
    min_tsep = delay * dim_try
    max_iter = min\(len\(y\) // 10, 500\)
    n_pts_embedded = len\(y\) - \(dim_try - 1\) * delay
    if n_pts_embedded < min_tsep + max_iter + 10:
        max_iter = max\(10, n_pts_embedded - min_tsep - 10\)
    
    embedded = _embed_signal\(y, dim_try, delay\)
    n_pts = len\(embedded\)
    
    nn_indices = np.full\(n_pts, -1, dtype=int\)
    nn_dists = np.full\(n_pts, np.inf\)
    for i in range\(n_pts\):
        for j in range\(n_pts\):
            if abs\(i - j\) >= min_tsep:
                dist = np.linalg.norm\(embedded[i] - embedded[j]\)
                if 0 < dist < nn_dists[i]:
                    nn_dists[i] = dist
                    nn_indices[i] = j
    
    divergence = np.zeros\(max_iter\)
    counts = np.zeros\(max_iter\)
    for i in range\(n_pts - max_iter\):
        j = nn_indices[i]
        if j < 0 or j >= n_pts - max_iter:
            continue
        for k in range\(max_iter\):
            dist = np.linalg.norm\(embedded[i + k] - embedded[j + k]\)
            if dist > 0:
                divergence[k] += np.log\(dist\)
                counts[k] += 1
    
    valid = counts > 0
    divergence[valid] /= counts[valid]
    divergence[~valid] = np.nan
    
    # Simple fit
    fit_end_simple = max\(10, max_iter // 5\)
    fm = np.isfinite\(divergence[:fit_end_simple]\)
    x = np.arange\(fit_end_simple\)[fm]
    d = divergence[:fit_end_simple][fm]
    slope_simple = np.polyfit\(x, d, 1\)[0] if len\(x\) >= 3 else np.nan
    
    # Adaptive fit
    fit_end_adaptive = _find_linear_region\(divergence, max_iter\)
    fm2 = np.isfinite\(divergence[:fit_end_adaptive]\)
    x2 = np.arange\(fit_end_adaptive\)[fm2]
    d2 = divergence[:fit_end_adaptive][fm2]
    if len\(d2\) >= 4:
        slope_adaptive, _, _, r2 = fit_linear_region\(d2, x2\)
        if r2 < 0.5:
            slope_adaptive = np.polyfit\(x2, d2, 1\)[0]
    else:
        slope_adaptive = np.polyfit\(x2, d2, 1\)[0] if len\(x2\) >= 3 else np.nan
    
    exp_simple = slope_simple / delay if delay > 0 else np.nan
    exp_adaptive = slope_adaptive / delay if delay > 0 else np.nan
    print\(f'dim={dim_try}: simple_fit={exp_simple:.6f}, adaptive_fit={exp_adaptive:.6f}, fit_end_adaptive={fit_end_adaptive}'\)
" 2>&1)

Bash(cd /Users/jasonrudder/pmtvs-core/packages/pmtvs-vector && env VIRTUAL_ENV=/Users/jasonrudder/pmtvs-core/.venv PATH="/Users/jasonrudder/.cargo/bin:/Users/jasonrudder/pmtvs-core/.venv/bin:/usr/bin:/bin:/usr/sbin:/sbin" /Users/jasonrudder/pmtvs-core/.venv/bin/python -c "
import numpy as np

# Exactly replicate the test: seed, create all signals
np.random.seed\(42\)
SIGNALS = {
    'random': np.random.randn\(500\),
    'sine': np.sin\(np.linspace\(0, 10 * np.pi, 500\)\),
    'trend': np.linspace\(0, 10, 500\) + np.random.randn\(500\) * 0.1,
    'constant': np.ones\(500\) * 42.0,
    'step': np.concatenate\([np.zeros\(250\), np.ones\(250\) * 5.0]\),
}

# Monkey-patch to trace
import sys
sys.path.insert\(0, '/Users/jasonrudder/pmtvs/packages/pmtvs-dynamics/python'\)
import pmtvs_dynamics.lyapunov as lyap_mod
original_rosenstein = lyap_mod.lyapunov_rosenstein

def traced_rosenstein\(signal, **kwargs\):
    delay = lyap_mod._auto_delay_acf\(signal\)
    dim = lyap_mod._auto_dim_simple\(signal, delay\)
    min_tsep = delay * dim
    max_iter = min\(len\(signal\) // 10, 500\)
    print\(f'  TRACE: delay={delay}, dim={dim}, min_tsep={min_tsep}, max_iter={max_iter}'\)
    return original_rosenstein\(signal, **kwargs\)

lyap_mod.lyapunov_rosenstein = traced_rosenstein
# Also patch the import path used by vector engine
import pmtvs_dynamics
pmtvs_dynamics.lyapunov_rosenstein = traced_rosenstein

# Now get the registry and call for random signal
from vector.registry import get_registry
reg = get_registry\(\)
py_fn = reg.get_compute\('lyapunov'\)

# This is what the test does:
print\('Random signal:'\)
result = py_fn\(SIGNALS['random']\)
print\(f'  Result: {result}'\)

print\('Sine signal:'\)
result = py_fn\(SIGNALS['sine']\)
print\(f'  Result: {result}'\)

print\('Trend signal:'\)
result = py_fn\(SIGNALS['trend']\)
print\(f'  Result: {result}'\)
" 2>&1)

import numpy as np
from pmtvs import lyapunov_rosenstein

# Exactly replicate test conditions step by step
np.random.seed\(42\)
SIGNALS = {
    'random': np.random.randn\(500\),
    'sine': np.sin\(np.linspace\(0, 10 * np.pi, 500\)\),
    'trend': np.linspace\(0, 10, 500\) + np.random.randn\(500\) * 0.1,
    'constant': np.ones\(500\) * 42.0,
    'step': np.concatenate\([np.zeros\(250\), np.ones\(250\) * 5.0]\),
}

# The test calls py_fn\(y\) for each engine Ã— signal parametrization
# But first it imports the registry, which might consume random numbers
from vector.registry import get_registry
reg = get_registry\(\)

# Now test all engines for 'random' in order
RUST_ENGINES = ['statistics', 'trend', 'peaks', 'frequency_bands', 'autocorrelation', 'gradient', 
                'entropy', 'spectral', 'snr', 'phase_coherence', 'dwell_times', 'cycle_counting',
                'transition_matrix', 'adf_stat',
                'hilbert_stability', 'hurst', 'memory', 'recurrence_rate', 'time_constant',
                'lof', 'complexity', 'determinism', 'embedding_dim', 'correlation_dimension',
                'lyapunov']

y = SIGNALS['random']
for eng in RUST_ENGINES:
    py_fn = reg.get_compute\(eng\)
    result = py_fn\(y\)
    if eng == 'lyapunov':
        print\(f'{eng}: {result}'\)
        break
    else:
        print\(f'{eng}: ran OK \(keys: {len\(result\)}\)'\)
" 2>&1)

import numpy as np
import pmtvs_vector

RUST_ENGINES = sorted\(pmtvs_vector.available_engines\(\)\)
print\(f'Rust engines \({len\(RUST_ENGINES\)}\): {RUST_ENGINES}'\)

# The test uses pytest parametrize with RUST_ENGINES and signal names.
# pytest parametrize iterates the LAST parametrize first \(inner loop\).
# @pytest.mark.parametrize\('engine_name', RUST_ENGINES\)
# @pytest.mark.parametrize\('signal_name', ['random', 'sine', 'trend']\)
# This means: for each signal, all engines run.

# Check test order
import pytest
# The parametrize order is: signal is outer, engine is inner
# random + all engines, then sine + all engines, then trend + all engines
print\(\)
print\('The test order is:'\)
print\('  random-adf_stat, random-attractor, ..., random-lyapunov, ..., random-wavelet_stability'\)
print\('  sine-adf_stat, ...'\)
print\(\)
print\(f'lyapunov is at index {RUST_ENGINES.index\(\\"lyapunov\\"\)} out of {len\(RUST_ENGINES\)} engines'\)
" 2>&1)

import numpy as np
from pmtvs import lyapunov_rosenstein
import sys
sys.path.insert\(0, '/Users/jasonrudder/pmtvs/packages/pmtvs-dynamics/python'\)
from pmtvs_dynamics.lyapunov import _auto_delay_acf, _auto_dim_simple

np.random.seed\(42\)
SIGNALS = {
    'random': np.random.randn\(500\),
    'sine': np.sin\(np.linspace\(0, 10 * np.pi, 500\)\),
    'trend': np.linspace\(0, 10, 500\) + np.random.randn\(500\) * 0.1,
}

# Check: what dim/delay does Cao give for each signal with seed=0?
for name, y in SIGNALS.items\(\):
    np.random.seed\(0\)
    delay = _auto_delay_acf\(y\)
    dim = _auto_dim_simple\(y, delay\)
    result = lyapunov_rosenstein\(y\)
    exp = result[0] if isinstance\(result, tuple\) else result
    
    np.random.seed\(0\)
    exp2 = lyapunov_rosenstein\(y\)[0]
    print\(f'{name}: delay={delay}, dim={dim}, exp={exp:.10f}, repeat={exp2:.10f}'\)
" 2>&1)
